analyzed: jātaka  duka nipāta  na ta da ḷha vagga
translated: Birth Stories🔽The Two-Volume Collection🔽The Chapter with Nata and Daḷha
All of them are afraid of the lion,
there is no equality in their bodies.
In the same way, among humans,
not just the fool with a big body.”🔽The Birth Story of Keḷisīla is the second.
